# NETWORK::NETWORK_GET_LOCAL_HANDLE

## Parameters
* **GAMER_HANDLE\*** gamerHandle
* **INT** sizeOfData

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Retrieve the local players gamer handle (this will be invalid if no local player is signed in)
